remarks: The sum of the von Mangoldt function multiplied by a non-principal Dirichlet character, divided by ` n ` , is bounded.  Equation 9.4.8 of [Shapiro], p. 376.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dchrmusum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrmusum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrmusum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrmusum.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrmusum.n1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .1. ) $.
dchrvmasum $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. RR+ |-> sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( ( X ` ( L ` n ) ) x. ( ( Lam ` n ) / n ) ) ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d .1. n x $.
$d D n x $.
$d L n x $.
$d N n x $.
$d X n x $.
$d Z n x $.
$d n ph x $.
